name: EXTRA-MD
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by Jelio Starr Dev

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: Select your bot work type: public/private.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want bot always online.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if you want automatic voice reply.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make it true for automatic status reaction.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply message on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message for status reply.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_LINK_ENABLED.description: Make it true if you want bot to auto remove group links.

ANTI_LINK_WARNINGS.description: Number of warnings before taking action.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot to auto delete bad words.

MENTION_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want mention reply when someone mentions you.

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Add URL for menu image and mention reply.

DESCRIPTION.description: Add caption for menu and other features.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recording.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Put here custom react emojis (comma separated).

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: Make it true if you want to track admin promotions/demotions.

WELCOME.description: Make it true if you want welcome/goodbye messages in groups.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot to read all messages immediately.

READ_CMD.description: Make it true if you want bot to read command messages.

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Make it true if you want bot to work in public mode.

ANTI_VV.description: Make it true to enable anti-view-once feature.

DEFAULT_TIMEZONE.description: Set default timezone for the bot.
